summary: This is a modders resource for a Stendarr Statue
descriptionHtml:
Stendarr Statue Modders Resource
Author: Edhildil
5,8,2015
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

Stendarr Statue made by request.

 
This is a modders resource for a Stendarr Statue, custom texture.

I realise that the normal maps are not the best so it could look better with a

little tweaking.

Also I am not knowledgable when it comes to creating collision boxes, this

statue was pasted into the Dibella statue to acquire the collision box and it

is not a perfect match. The arms have no collision so if one were to scale it

tall enough the player character would be shorter than the arms, then it

wo'nt matter. Also the collision box is much higher than the head of the

statue so make sure to keep that in mind when placing the statue. if there is

something right above the statue that a player character would walk on like a

bridge or walkway then there may be an issue (invisible collision). Other than

those issues I think it came out pretty good.

To retain quality, I did not compress the regular textures, I believe the

normal maps have been compressed though.

In the test I made I added snow for the screenshots. This is done in the CK

and is not part of the actual textures. To do this, in the static ID box for

your statue, in the Directional Material box select "SnowMaterialObject1p".

For no snow select"None". Set Max Angle box to "120". You can set the angle

between 30-120, but other statues are at 120 so that's my guess.

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

v2 updated the texture filepaths

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Skyrim. That's it.

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


This is just a modders resource, not an actual mod. It is intended for modders

to use in their mods.



[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Bethesda for the original meshes and textures.

Edhildil for the mesh posing and new texture


Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

Please use freely, all I ask is that you give me credit for my work.
author: Edhildil
